name: lmfit.js
description: Library for Levenberg-Marquardt least-squares minimization and curve fitting

scripts.patch:lmfit: npm run patch1:lmfit && npm run patch2:lmfit && npm run patch3:lmfit
scripts.build: emcc --memory-init-file 0 -Isrc/lmfit/lib -Os src/lmfit/build/lib/liblmfit.a src/lmfit.js.c -o lmfit.js --pre-js src/pre.js --post-js src/post.js -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS=[_do_fit] -s RESERVED_FUNCTION_POINTERS=20
scripts.build:lmfit: npm run patch:lmfit && cd src/lmfit && mkdir -p build && cd build && emcmake cmake -DSHARED_LIBS=OFF -DCMAKE_CROSSCOMPILING_EMULATOR='node' .. && emmake make -j4 && ctest

author: jvail
